title: 1-on-1 Remote Tech Training
headline: Learn securely and confidently at your pace.
description: Get personalized tech training for any skill level. We offer private, remote sessions on everything from basics to advanced topics.

sections.heading: Did You Know?
paragraph: Hands-on training improves retention and confidence far more than videos or self-paced tutorials.
Most tech frustrations come from skipped basics or poor explanations. Personalized training fixes that by focusing only on what you need.
Many privacy and security risks come from simple user mistakes. A little guided training prevents most of them.

sections.heading: Popular Topics
items: Basic computer skills, file management, and safe browsing
Windows, macOS, and mobile device navigation and configuration
Setting up email, cloud storage, and secure backups
Cybersecurity best practices for non-technical users
Safe online shopping, banking, and scam awareness
Digital hygiene for families, seniors, or new device users

sections.heading: How It Works
sections.paragraph: Remote training is available for local clients with a remote access plan. We come to you to install and configure the software, then schedule live sessions tailored to your goals. Training is done over a secure screen-sharing connection, step by step, with zero pressure.
